title: BRIEF-Novatti Group Says Granted A Principal Issuer Licence Of Visa Worldwide
text:
BRIEF-Novatti Group Says Granted A Principal Issuer Licence Of Visa Worldwide

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 10:10)

BRIEF-Novatti Group Says Granted A Principal Issuer Licence Of Visa Worldwide Sept 9 (Reuters) - Novatti Group Ltd : * GRANTED, A PRINCIPAL ISSUER LICENCE OF VISA WORLDWIDE PTY LIMITED, UNIT OF VISA INC * INITIAL REVENUES FROM FIRST FOUR CLIENTS FOR THIS FY ARE EXPECTED TO ADD CIRCA $300,000 TO NOVATTI'S REVENUES

BRIEF-Novatti Group Says Granted A Principal Issuer Licence Of Visa Worldwide
description: BRIEF-Novatti Group Says Granted A Principal Issuer Licence Of Visa Worldwide
